name: Story
description:
Story is an unusual RPG game which leaves you a lot of place for your own interpretation of in-game events, characters and your own choices. The title refers to the fact that you create your own story rather than you are given one just to read. It doesn't mean that there's no plot but the plot is left for you to uncover in your own way.

Explore the Tomb!


In Story you are a Skeleton living in an ancient tomb, which is robbed by ruthless adventurers. The tomb has many secrets waiting for you to uncover them.

Smash your enemies!


There's no one who could escape your vengeance! Kill everyone you find in the tomb (even your own character if you want).

Every choice matters


In Story every choice matters and has it's consequences which will lead you to one of the 35 endings.
